Beach Paradise Survival: Anime Girl Battle 3D

Download Full Game [FREE]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beach.paradise.survival.animegirlfriend3d&hl=en_US

ACCEPT THE CHALLENGE
Are you a fan of 3D Adventure Games? If yes, Beach Paradise Survival is the number 1 game for you. Play as an Anime Girl trying to save her island from Giant Turtle Invasion.
Use your super powers to battle against those enemies. Join the battle and destroy all enemies in this epic Action-Adventure story.

KEY FEATURES:
√ Experience Smooth Touch Control Game-play.
√ Realistic 3D graphics and smooth animations.
√ Play this game offline everywhere and any time.
√ Face Intelligent Enemies will follow you if you come too close.
√ Achieve the set objectives in order to progress to the next levels.
√ Enemies becomes quicker and more difficult to defeat as you reach higher levels within the game.
